data.eml:eml: Mites of the superfamily Pygmephoroidea (Acari: Heterostigmata: Neopygmephoridae, Pygmephoridae) associated with Trox cadaverinus (Coleoptera: Trogidae) from the Far East of Russia, with description of a new genus and two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Khaustov, Alexandr A., Trach, Viacheslav A. (2014): Mites of the superfamily Pygmephoroidea (Acari: Heterostigmata: Neopygmephoridae, Pygmephoridae) associated with Trox cadaverinus (Coleoptera: Trogidae) from the Far East of Russia, with description of a new genus and two new species. Zootaxa 3754 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.1.4
